oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Improving the sustainability of crop nutrition in horticultural soil
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nutrient turnover
Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This project aims to improve undestanding of the chemical and microbiological factors that control nutrient supply in horticultural soil so that inputs can be adjusted to maximise production efficiency and minimise pollution.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Project} Improving the sustainability of crop nutrition in horticultural soil. Runs 2004 - 2008. Project Leader(s): Lennartson, Margi, Henry Doubleday Research Association (HDRA).
